com.amazonaws.mobile.auth.userpools

Class UserPoolSignInView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.amazonaws.mobile.auth.userpools.UserPoolSignInView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class UserPoolSignInView
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
    User Pools Sign-in Control. This view presents a form to handle user sign-in. It also presents choices for creating a new account or retrieving a forgotten password.
